strong.span: COVID-19 and Emergency Closure Child Care Information under Quick Links on Home Page

span.style: color :Black; font-family :Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size :9pt;
font-family :Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size :9pt; color : Black;

td.span: While information is rapidly changing, and experts are learning more every day, on this page are some resource links that address COVID-19 concerns for our younger population and higher risk groups, along with communications from Dover-Eyota Schools to our families. As more information and resources become available, we will continue to update this page.

strong.a: Ordering Bag Cold Meals online (D-E Food Service)
